slider.subSloganText: Complete SmartTV framework with unique features

features.title: Unique Features
features.subTitle: What make us different? Here some cool, unique features of BluPoint SmartTV Framework

data.title: Open Source
data.description: Yes it's completely an open source project. We started to develop and will grow with your commits.

data.title: Native Javascript
data.description:
No, we are not joking. There is no external libraries such as jQuery.
Just EcmaScript 6

data.title: Modularity
data.description: As we discussed to write this framework in ES6. We tried to use its all features like classes, modules etc. As result we prepared readable, clean code

data.title: Cross Platform
data.description: It supports most of SmartTV manufacturers. We are supporting old Opera (Presto Engine) too.

data.title: DRM-Ready
data.description: DRM's are indispensable part of VOD content providers. Our framework includes its own DRM implementations for SmartTV's with their own DRM Engine

data.title: Multi Audio
data.description: You don't need to confuse with audio change for your digital content. We care that!

data.title: VMAP & VAST ADS Supported
data.description: Fully integrated VMAP parsing with IAB's Vmap standard. Vast render and seamless integration

data.title: Tons of features
data.description: We are offering a lot of features like Subtitle, Event, Storage etc. You can find them in documentation.

highlight.title: How to initialize
highlight.subTitle: Our main focus is speed, ease of use and newest technology. Before reading documentation we wanted to show how to initalize BluPoint SmartTV Framework in your project.

promo.title: Got a minute? Give it a try
promo.subTitle: While we are working to release first stable version lets give it a try and contribute for growing of BluPoint SmartTV Framework
